Author: yingxionglianmeng
Title: [ANN] 📹 VIDION — CHANGING VIDEO JOURNALISM!📹
Body: I'm with you since the first telegram group. Really sure I'm in this project. I'd love to join the signature bounty of this project.@Team, will you announce the bounty program here?

Author: chixka000
Title: [ANN] 📹 VIDION — CHANGING VIDEO JOURNALISM!📹
Body: I rarely meet projects aimed at journalism. I think it's interesting. But still I did not see anything special in the project. In addition, you have a bounty allocated only 3%, it may be worth increasing?

Author: andriw
Title: [ANN] 📹 VIDION — CHANGING VIDEO JOURNALISM!📹
Body: If I look at the work scheme then the bid process and video content selection should be done on the same day as the video upload time, if it is more than 1 day then the news video becomes out-of-date. Then which media are invited to work together on Vidion platform?

Author: Otap2018
Title: [ANN] 📹 VIDION — CHANGING VIDEO JOURNALISM!📹
Body: VIDION will save the media’s time, effort and finance that they expend in search for freelance journalists and non-professional correspondents . Production and sale of video footage will run more smoothly and become profitable and truly open for everyone.

Author: Praetorian.1legion
Title: [ANN] 📹 VIDION — CHANGING VIDEO JOURNALISM!📹
Body: Creating paid content for video authors is a boon to them. But, who will buy these materials? Who will be willing to pay money?
